RT @PabloReports Asked @LeaderMcConnell about concerns voters of color have about voting rights. ‚ÄúThe concern is misplaced,‚Äù said McConnell, ‚Äúbecause if you look at the statistics, African-American voters are voting in just as high a percentage as Americans."

RT @Acyn Ossoff: Do not invoke Congressman Lewis‚Äô name to signal your virtue while you work to erode his legacy http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1483965652381536256/pu/img/KIOHlrkB1m0APOOW.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1483965652381536256/pu/vid/480x270/owZAcY0xsDJtGOT_.mp4?tag=12

The majority is allowed 9 seats (hand picked by the Speaker) on the Rules Committee, while the minority is allowed only 4 seats.

Traditionally, the Rules Committee is called ‚Äúthe Speaker‚Äôs Committee.‚Äù

Virtually all legislation passes through ‚ÄúRules‚Äù before coming to the floor.

Did you know?

The first committee to convene every week the US House is in session is the Rules Committee.

They decide which rules to follow & which rules to ignore for each piece of legislation on the floor that week.

Changing rules in either chamber should require 2/3 vote!
